attributes.action: Hard Working Local people should get priority for housing at there local housing council instead of Criminals, Addicts,  Immigrants, EU people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It seems at present that to get a chance of a house you have to be a Criminal, Addict, immigrant or an EU resident.  

It is too easy for these people to leave and dump themselves at our door step and demand help.  It is unfortunate that some of these people come from dire circumstances but the UK have there problems too.  The UK is a small island with big ambitions to solve everyone’s problems bar their own.

The point’s system demands looking into because hard working people and families are feeling left out. 

Understandably some foreign people can be a benefit for areas but that excuse along with Brits are lazy has been taken too far. 

In my area housing is prioritised to these people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
